latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: The owner or agent tenant or manager fails to maintain building in safe manner Structural integrety not maintained Building not free of pests Adequate heat ventilation and lighting not provided Not free of nuisances/hazards
